title: Handle a Home Sale Contingent Offer
description: A buyer makes an offer that is contingent on them selling their current home. The listing agent must advise the seller.

tasks.description: Review the contingent offer, paying close attention to the terms of the contingency, such as the timeline for the buyer to sell their home.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent fully understands the terms and risks of the contingency.

tasks.description: Advise the seller on the pros and cons of accepting a contingent offer and suggest adding a 'kick-out' clause.
tasks.expected_outcome: Seller understands the risks and decides to counter with a kick-out clause, allowing them to accept another offer.

tasks.description: Negotiate the terms of the contingency and kick-out clause with the buyer's agent.
tasks.expected_outcome: An agreement is reached that protects the seller's interests while accepting the contingent offer.
